.class nested public interface auto ansi abstract View/IOnLayoutChangeListener implements class Android.Runtime.IJavaObject, class Java.Interop.IJavaPeerable, class System.IDisposable

Docs.summary: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when the layout bounds of a view changes due to layout processing.
